channel.title: Inside Georgia Music MP3
channel.itunes:author: Georgia Music Hall of Fame
channel.description: Each month, Inside Georgia Music features live artist interviews, new songs, Georgia music news, historical audio from the Georgia Music Hall of Fame archives and Roam devoted to music festivals and other happenings around the state. Hosted by Nick Purdy and featuring Georgia Music Hall of Fame Executive Director Lisa Love.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Each month, Inside Georgia Music features live artist interviews, new songs, Georgia music news, and historical audio from the Georgia Music Hall of Fame.
channel.itunes:summary: Each month, Inside Georgia Music features live artist interviews, new songs, Georgia music news, historical audio from the Georgia Music Hall of Fame archives and Roam devoted to music festivals and other happenings around the state. Hosted by Nick Purdy and featuring Georgia Music Hall of Fame Executive Director Lisa Love.

item.title: Inside Georgia Music MP3 for Friday, December 05, 2008
item.itunes:author: Georgia Music Hall of Fame
item.description: Special episode devoted to Christmas music in Georgia - including interviews music with Clarence Carter and Buddy Greene, plus interviews with Jeff Clark and Reid Davis and music from James Brown and Clay Cook.
item.itunes:subtitle: Special episode devoted to Christmas music in Georgia - including interviews music with Clarence Carter and Buddy Greene, plus interviews with Jeff Clark and Reid Davis and music from James Brown and Clay Cook.
item.itunes:summary: Special episode devoted to Christmas music in Georgia - including interviews music with Clarence Carter and Buddy Greene, plus interviews with Jeff Clark and Reid Davis and music from James Brown and Clay Cook.

item.title: Inside Georgia Music MP3 for Friday, January 25, 2008

item.description: Interview with Patterson Hood of Drive-By Truckers, Lisa Love from the Georgia Music Hall of Fame, plus Jeff Clark from Stomp Stammer, and new music from Attractive Eighties Women, The Georgia Fireflies, Dead Confederate and Drive-By Truckers.

item.title: Inside Georgia Music MP3 for Thursday, December 27, 2007
item.itunes:author: Georgia Music Hall of Fame
item.description: Interview with Dave Schools of Widespread Panic, rare archive interview audio of the great Duane Allman from 1970, plus Jeff Clark from Stomp Stammer, film in Georgia and new music from Jagged Edge, The Whigs and Anna Kramer The Lost Cause.

item.title: Inside Georgia Music MP3 for Tuesday, November 20, 2007

item.description: Interview with MC J-Mil of Collective Efforts, Pamela Peacock and Richard Sampson, producers of the upcoming film Good Intentions, plus Jeff Clark from Stomp Stammer, travel film in Georgia and new music from Soulja Boy, The Selmanaires, Collective Efforts Evan McHugh.
